title: Italianissimo 1: beginners: a multimedia course for learning italian
brief_description: The books contain most of the conversations recorded in the video episodes of the series. The “Teacher’s edition” gives detailed notes with additional material as well as lesson plans and optional exercises. The “Student’s edition” reviews material in the course with language exercises and notes on italian life and culture. The videos and audio-cassettes may be loaned as separate items. The author of the two texts is Denise De Rome.
